Malice:
 
Malice rolled off his bed and walked to the door.  He shut the door and locked it, programming the door tone to respond only to Hellplague and Blacknightmare.
"I've locked my door, anything else, Master?"

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNighmare:

"Sorry Malice...I didn't like disturb you"replied kindly the 
femme "I suggest that you should close your room's door... by now I 
later will explain ya"





--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Necross/ Malice:
>  
> "*I'll do that.  Just keep your pet away from Splattercannon fo a 
while.*" Necross said before someone else cut in.
> "*Would you please quit yelling through the comm system?  I'm 
trying to sleep here!*" Malice said with much irritation in his 
voice.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> "I'm loyal to Unicron and you know..."replied BlackNightmare while 
> her bedroom's door automatically closed"I never betray him... 
I 'll 
> pay your advice with other: This stupid bot could be a danger 
> without know it and with out willing him. You should watch him 
> too!!! "
>

as

their

system.

is
